articles.description: Pipeline operator in Ukraine halted gas through border point accounting for a third of Russian exports to Europe
articles.content:

articles.title: Ukraine stops Russian gas at key hub as Russia raises possibility of annexing Kherson - CBC.ca
articles.description: Ukraine shut down a pipeline Wednesday that carries Russian natural gas to homes and industries in Western Europe, while a Kremlin-installed official in the southern region of Kherson, seized by Russian troops, said the area will ask Moscow to annex it.
